tool_description:
Get clean data from Amazon, effortlessly.
Currently available: Keywords ranking, search results and listing details.
name: Datamz
title: Datamz

api_list.name: Listing detail
api_list.description: Get product detail based on an ASIN.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://datamz.p.rapidapi.com/de/product/B08H93ZRK9"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "datamz.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://datamz.p.rapidapi.com/{countrycode}/product/{asin}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "datamz.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search results
api_list.description:
Get products informations matching a search.
Results are ordered like they are in the real page.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://datamz.p.rapidapi.com/us/keywords/cork yoga block/results"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "datamz.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://datamz.p.rapidapi.com/{countrycode}/keywords/{keyword}/results"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "datamz.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
